decks.notes: This UWx Control deck focuses on disruption and removal to control the game, utilizing counterspells like Force of Will and Spell Pierce, as well as removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending. The deck also includes card advantage engines like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to outvalue the opponent. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while generating card advantage and controlling the board until it can close out the game with powerful threats like Thundertrap Trainer.

This Legacy Death & Taxes deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck includes a mix of powerful creatures like Recruiter of the Guard and Skyclave Apparition, along with removal spells such as Swords to Plowshares. The use of Aether Vial allows for quick deployment of creatures, while cards like Containment Priest and Thoughtseize can disrupt combo strategies. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with efficient creatures.

The main idea of this deck is to aggressively lock down the opponent's mana base using cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void, while also ramping up quickly with Ancient Tomb and Simian Spirit Guide. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Sundering Eruption and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to secure the win. With a focus on disrupting the opponent's resources and quickly establishing a dominant board presence, this Dragon Stompy deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a swift victory.

Utilize the graveyard as a resource to quickly and efficiently cheat powerful creatures onto the battlefield, disrupting opponents with counter magic and hand disruption while setting up the graveyard with cards like Entomb. The deck aims to quickly reanimate creatures such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier while potentially utilizing cards like Brazen Borrower and Murktide Regent for additional value. Additionally, Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage and filtering while controlling the board with cards like Thoughtseize and Daze.

The main concept of the deck is to exert early pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells while maintaining tempo control through cards like Daze and Force of Will. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Nihil Spellbomb, while also applying pressure with creatures like Brazen Borrower and Nethergoyf. The mana base is streamlined to ensure consistent casting of spells while also utilizing cards like Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly disrupt opponent's mana base with cards like Blood Moon, Chalice of the Void, and Magus of the Moon, while also ramping up its own mana production with cards like City of Traitors and Chrome Mox. The deck utilizes aggressive creatures like Broadside Bombardiers and Pyrogoyf to quickly apply pressure on the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes powerful removal spells like Fury and Sundering Eruption to deal with threats. Overall, the strategy revolves around locking down the opponent's resources and finishing the game quickly with its aggressive creatures and spells.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently reanimate powerful creatures from the graveyard, using cards like Reanimate, Entomb, and Animate Dead. The deck also includes disruption and card draw elements like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Brainstorm to help protect and dig for combo pieces. With strong creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats while controlling the game through disruption and card advantage.

The main focus of this Aggro deck is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent with efficient and low-cost creatures like Murktide Regent, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Cori-Steel Cutter, while also disrupting their game plan with counterspells like Daze and Force of Will. The deck aims to control the tempo of the game by using cards like Ponder and Brainstorm to set up powerful plays, alongside effective removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning. The mana base is optimized for speed and consistency, with impactful lands like Wasteland and Island','','');">Volcanic Island.

The deck focuses on utilizing control elements such as counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to outvalue and outlast opponents. By using cards like Force of Will, Swords to Plowshares, and Teferi, Time Raveler, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining card advantage through Ponder, Brainstorm, and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. The inclusion of versatile removal options like Prismatic Ending and Flame of Anor allows for efficient answers to a variety of threats. The deck also incorporates a small package of creature threats like Snapcaster Mage and Thundertrap Trainer to pressure opponents when necessary.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly get powerful creatures into the graveyard using cards like Entomb and Brainstorm, and then bring them back onto the battlefield using reanimation spells such as Reanimate and Animate Dead. The deck also includes countermagic like Force of Will and Force of Negation to protect its combo pieces. Additionally, cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Atraxa, Grand Unifier provide card advantage and utility. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with high-impact creatures and disrupt their game plan with disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Daze.

This Dragon Stompy deck aims to disrupt the opponent's mana base and lock them out of casting spells with cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void. It uses fast mana in the form of Chrome Mox, Simian Spirit Guide, and Ancient Tomb to power out threats like Broadside Bombardiers and Fury. The deck also includes powerful removal spells like Sundering Eruption and Pyrogoyf to control the board. With a mix of disruption, aggression, and efficient threats, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure a quick victory.

This deck revolves around utilizing artifacts like Mystic Forge and various key pieces like Voltaic Key and Manifold Key to create powerful combos and generate massive value. The deck seeks to quickly ramp up with cards like Grim Monolith and Lotus Petal, while also disrupting opponents with cards like Pithing Needle and Tormod's Crypt. Tezzeret, Karn, and Ugin provide additional utility and win conditions, while Urza lands and Planar Nexus ensure consistent mana production and resources. The overall strategy is to overwhelm opponents with a combination of fast mana, card advantage, and strategic disruption.

The key concept of this deck revolves around using Mystic Forge in combination with various artifacts to generate a powerful combo win condition. By utilizing cards like Basalt Monolith, Voltaic Key, and Defense Grid, the deck aims to quickly assemble the necessary pieces to create a game-winning board state. Additionally, cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Urza's Saga provide additional support and utility to further enhance the combo potential of the deck. Overall, the deck focuses on fast and efficient artifact synergy to overwhelm opponents and secure victory.

The main strategy of this deck is to control the game by utilizing lands as a resource. By utilizing cards like Exploration and Wasteland, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's resources while generating its own advantage. Malevolent Rumble and Disruptor Flute provide additional control elements, while cards like Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage can create powerful threats. The deck also includes utility lands like Bojuka Bog, Ghost Quarter, and Maze of Ith to further control the battlefield. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent through land-based interactions and control elements.

The deck focuses on utilizing card draw and tutor effects to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Murktide Regent. By using cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead, the player can bring these creatures back onto the battlefield for a devastating and unexpected attack. The inclusion of disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will help protect the combo pieces and ensure the opponent has limited options for stopping the reanimation strategy. The deck also includes utility creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier to provide additional support and threats on the battlefield.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive Eldrazi creatures and disrupt their game plan with cards like Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer. The deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game by playing efficient threats like Reality Smasher and Eldrazi Linebreaker, while also utilizing powerful lands like Eye of Ugin and Eldrazi Temple to cast its high-cost Eldrazi creatures. It also includes disruption cards like Wasteland and Glaring Fleshraker to control the opponent's resources and secure victory through fast and relentless aggression.
